attributes.action: Removal / sacking of of all MP,S that have voted against their constituents.
attributes.additional_details: 3 yrs ago the population voted to leave the EU under this country,s rules ( 1st past the post )??.
attributes.background: We voted to leave the EU & leave we must otherwise you risk alienating a whole country for years to come & many people will simply not vote any longer ( this I suspect would make things much worse ( carefull what you wish for !!! ).

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible fore removing MP's from office because of their views or opinions.
